sentences.sContent: We meet regularly, once a month.
sentences.sCn: 我们定期见面，每月一次。

sentences.sContent: ...then it would react to the irregular beeps by stirring people from sleep and would ignore the regularly timed ones...
...Health experts regularly criticise them severely for selling food that makes people fat...
...We don’t do that regularly — it’s the first time this school year...
...Heidrich now visits websites that discuss gaming addiction regularly to remind myself to keep my love for online games in check...
...Toebe also regularly visits a site where posters discuss Internet overuse...
...Most men get their cars serviced more regularly than they service their bodies...

synos.tran: 定期地；有规律地；整齐地；匀称地

words.tran: 定期的；有规律的；合格的；整齐的
常客；正式队员；中坚分子
调整；使有秩序；使合法化
使合法化；使有秩序（等于regularize）

trans.tranOther: at the same time each day, week, month etc
